title: Separating Feet and Inches
text: To convert $$6$$ feet $$4$$ inches into inches, we can convert $$6$$ feet to inches first, and add $$4$$ to that value.

title: Relating Feet to Inches
text: The conversion from feet to inches is $$1$$ $$foot=12$$ inches.

title: Writing $$1$$ as a Fraction
text: Using the relation between hours and seconds, we can rewrite the $$1$$ we multiply in the first step as (12 inches)/(1 foot), so we get the expression (6 feet)*(12 inches)/(1 foot).

title: Simplifying
text: Feet (foot) divides out, so we get the expression (6)*(12 inches)/1.
